overview: By the will of fate, the twin boys were separated in the hospital. Guys grow up with different outlooks and principles of life, unaware of each other's existence. But one feature unites them - it is obstinacy. The orphanage resident Motor Leha contacts the Ytyr company, famous for its criminal machinations. Өttүk Leha, who grew up in a family, works as a physical education teacher in the village. His half-brother Rodion, who is the head of the construction company "Dio5ur", also lives there. These two firms collide with each other, not sharing a large prize for the further implementation and development of their companies. "Ytyr" and ko starts a war with the "Dio5ur" company. And then he comes to the defense of his brother Өttүk Lyokh in order to restore justice in a peaceful way, But Motor, decides to go to the end...
title: Enemy by Blood
